attributes.action: Vaccinate all Primary and Secondary school teachers before we return to work.
attributes.additional_details:
Teachers are on the front line working with children and young adults who are transmitting Covid-19. Thousands of us are falling ill and many of us are fearful for ourselves and our families as we prepare to (be forced to) return to work next week.
Teachers, along with other healthcare professionals and frontline staff, should be given the vaccine as an absolute priority if the Government expects us to continue to teach pupils whilst putting our lives, and the lives of our families in danger.
attributes.background: Vaccinate all Primary and Secondary teachers as a priority before we return to work.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
